description: Displays a graphical representation of data.
name: graph

graphheight.description: Height of the graph, in pixels. Default is 240.

query.description: Name of the query containing the data to graph. Required if you do not use cfgraphdata tags in the cfgraph tag body to specify the data values.

valuelabelsize.description: The size the value text, in points.

titlefont.description: The font used to display the title.

urlcolumn.description: Query column containing URL information to load when the user clicks the corresponding data point.

gridlines.description: An integer that specifies the number of grid lines to display on the chart between the top and bottom lines.

title.description: Title to display centered above the chart, or below the chart if the legend is above the chart.

scalefrom.description: The minimum value of the graph value axis (the vertical axis for Bar charts, the horizontal axis for HorizontalBar charts).

colorlist.description: Comma delimited list of colors to use for each data point.

showitemlabel.description: Specifies whether to put item labels on the horizontal axis of bar charts and the vertical axis of HorizontalBar charts.

valuecolumn.description:
Query column that contains the data values.
      Required if you do not use cfgraphdata tags in the cfgraph tag body to specify the data values.

legendfont.description: The font used to display the legend.

showvaluelabel.description: Specifies whether values are displayed for the data points.

barspacing.description: Spacing between bars in the chart, in pixels.

graphwidth.description: Width of the graph, in pixels. Default is 320.

fileformat.description: File type to be used for the output displayed in the browser.

linecolor.description: The color used to draw the data line.

valuelabelfont.description: The font used to display data values.

fill.description: Width of the graph line, in pixels.

scaleto.description: The maximum value of the graph value axis.

depth.description: Depth of 3D chart appearance, in pixels.

url.description: A URL to load when the user clicks any data point on the chart.

linewidth.description: Specifies whether to fill the area below the line with the line color to create an area graph.

itemlabelsize.description: The size of the item labels, in points.

showlegend.description: The placement of the legend that identifies colors with the data labels.

itemcolumn.description: Query column that contains the item label for the corresponding data point. The item labels appear in the chart legend.

itemlabelfont.description: The font used for the item labels.
